flawed_nl_solution:
Lucy can read 20 more pages than Oliver who can read 40 pages so Lucy can read 40+20 = <<20+40=70>>70 pages
Carter can read half as many pages as Lucy who can read 70 pages so he can read 70/2 = <<35=35>>35 pages in 1 hour
#### 35

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 70. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
